/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. A green fence runs along the side of the road, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of looking up at the buildings and trees, adding depth and dimension to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and fence contrasting against the blue sky and the various colors of the cars and buildings. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the energy and movement of the city.
